@usedefault
@@title Account: ${name}
{{Account}}
{% if id %}
h2. Account: ${name}

{% if status != 'DESTROYED' %}
{{actions:
- display: Edit
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/account/update
  reload: true
  clearform: false
  input:
  - name: name
    label: Name
    placeholder:
    type: text
    default: '${name}'

  - name: maxMemoryCapacity
    label: Max Memory Capacity (GB)
    placeholder: leave empty if no limits should be set
    type: float
    {% if resourceLimits["CU_M"] !=  -1   %}
    default: '${resourceLimits["CU_M"]}'
    {% endif %}

  - name: maxVDiskCapacity
    label: Max VDisk Capacity (GB)
    placeholder: leave empty if no limits should be set
    type: number
    {% if resourceLimits["CU_D"] !=  -1   %}
    default: '${resourceLimits["CU_D"]}'
    {% endif %}

  - name: maxCPUCapacity
    label: Max Number of CPU Cores
    placeholder: leave empty if no limits should be set
    type: number
    {% if resourceLimits["CU_C"] !=  -1   %}
    default: '${resourceLimits["CU_C"]}'
    {% endif %}

  - name: maxNetworkPeerTransfer
    label: Max External Network Transfer (GB)
    placeholder: leave empty if no limits should be set
    type: number
    {% if resourceLimits["CU_NP"] !=  -1   %}
    default: '${resourceLimits["CU_NP"]}'
    {% endif %}

  - name: maxNumPublicIP
    label: Max Number of Public IP Addresses
    placeholder: leave empty if no limits should be set
    type: number
    {% if resourceLimits["CU_I"] !=  -1   %}
    default: '${resourceLimits["CU_I"]}'
    {% endif %}

  - name: sendAccessEmails
    label: Email is sent when a user is granted access to a resource
    type: dropdown
    values:
     - label: "Yes"
       value: 1
     - label: "No"
       value: 0

  - name: accountId
    type: hidden
    value: $$id

{% if status != "DISABLED" %}
- display: Disable
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/account/disable
  data:
   accountId: $$id
   async: true
  input:
  - reason
{% else %}
- display: Enable
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/account/enable
  data:
   accountId: $$id
  input:
  - reason
{% endif %}
- display: Delete
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/account/delete
  data:
   accountId: $$id
  input:
  - reason

- display: Grant User Access
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/account/addUser
  hide: true
  data:
   accountId: $$id
  input:
  - name: username
    label: Username or email address (an invitation will be sent to unregistered emails)
    type: text
  - name: accesstype
    type: dropdown
    label: ACL
    values:
     - label: Admin
       value: ARCXDU
     - label: Write
       value: RCX
     - label: Read
       value: R

- display: Revoke User Access
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/account/deleteUser
  hide: true
  data:
   accountId: $$id
  input:
  - name: recursivedelete
    type: dropdown
    label: Do you want to recursively remove user permissions from all owned cloudspaces and vmachines?
    values:
     - label: 'Yes'
       value: true
     - label: 'No'
       value: false
}}
{% endif %}

{{createspace: accountId:$$id}}

h3. Details
|*Account ID*|$$id|
|*Status*|${status}|
|*Creation Time*|{{ts: ${creationTime}}}|
|*Update Time*|{{ts: ${updateTime}}}|

h3. Cloud Resource Limits
|*Memory Capacity*|${'Unlimited' if resourceLimits.CU_M ==  -1  else '%r GB'%(resourceLimits.CU_M)}|
|*VDisk Capacity*|${'Unlimited' if resourceLimits.CU_D ==  -1  else '%i GB'%(resourceLimits.CU_D)}|
|*Number of CPU Cores*|${'Unlimited' if resourceLimits.CU_C ==  -1  else resourceLimits.CU_C}|
|*External Network Transfer*|${'Unlimited' if resourceLimits.CU_NP ==  -1  else '%i GB'%(resourceLimits.CU_NP)}|
|*Number of Public IP Addresses*|${'Unlimited' if resourceLimits.CU_I ==  -1  else resourceLimits.CU_I}|

h3. Users Access
{{action: id:'action-GrantUserAccess' class:'glyphicon glyphicon-plus margin-bottom-medium margin-left-medium' label:'Grant User Access'}}
||User Name||E-Mail||ACL||Status||Revoke Access||
{% for user in users -%}
    | {%if user.userstatus!='INVITED' %} [${user.name}|/CBGrid/user?id=${user.ud}] {%else%} ${user.name} {% endif %} |${", ".join(user.emails)}|${user.acl}|${user.userstatus if user.userstatus else 'N/A'}|{{action deleterow:true id:'action-RevokeUserAccess' data-username:'${user.name}' class:'glyphicon glyphicon-remove'}}|
{% endfor %}

h3. Cloud Spaces
{{action: id:'create_space' class:'glyphicon glyphicon-plus margin-bottom-medium margin-left-medium' label:'Add Cloud Space'}}

{{actions: gridbinding:'table_cloudbroker_Cloudspace cloudspaceIds'
- display: Delete Cloud Spaces
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/cloudspace/destroyCloudSpaces
  reload: false
  input:
  - reason
 }}
{{cbspaces: accountId:$$id}}

h3. Audits
{{grid.audits accountId:$$id}}
{% else %}
No account provided
{% endif %}
